name: Gracias Señor
description:
(English below)
GRACIAS, SEÑOR 
Autor Miguel Cortez
                                                                                                                                                                               Gracias por este día, Señor.   
Un nuevo día en que amanece 
Y vemos la estrella del sol 
Y al lucero del alba que aparece.  

En este día, todo llega brillando.  
Las flores en el jardín 
Y las aves, que van volando, 
Con sus trinos, nos hacen revivir.

(English)

THANK YOU, LORD 
Author Miguel Cortez
                                                                                                                                                                               Thank you for this day, Lord.   
A new day is dawning 
And we see the star of the sun 
And the dawn star appearing.  

On this day, everything comes shining.  
The flowers in the garden 
And the birds, who fly away, 
With their trills, make us come alive.


Today we start these collaborations Father and daughter :)

Many years ago my father published his first book of poems and I illustrated each one of them, I was a teenager and I didn't even think that one day I would dedicate myself to art, because I didn't believe I had the talent for it.
My father wisely gave me the task of illustrating his poems, I know he did it to instill confidence in myself.

Today, after many years, we make this beautiful collaboration together:
My father is the author of the poems, the voice you hear is his, that kind voice that has lulled me since I was a little girl.

My father is all heart and feelings.

I provide the illustrations, as you can see, they are animations that sweetly describe each verse.

I hope you enjoy our first NFT of illustrated poems. 
Poems that can be read, heard, seen and felt.

2D digital animation on offer. 
Animation in MP4 format.

Completion date: December 31, 2021 
Technique: Digital drawing and 2D animation 
Software: Photoshop.
Author of the animation: Eva Cortez.

The artwork may not be reproduced commercially. The author reserves the right to use the image of the work for merchandising.

You will have access to my Discord server. Once there you will have access to the exclusive channel for collectors. 

In this private channel I will share with you the release of new drops. Special gifts. Exclusive access to my creative process.

thank you very much for supporting our artwork!
